name: mcp-copilot-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension that mimics GitHub Copilot chat agent with Playwright MCP integration

scripts.kill-server: lsof -ti:8765 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No server running on port 8765'
scripts.restart: npm run kill-server && sleep 1 && npm run server
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required - extension files are in src/'
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run verify to check setup, then npm run server to start the MCP bridge server'
